Comments_List: I learned a lot about the Italian language and culture. I was exposed to vocabulary, grammar, and conversation skills.
This class allowed me to further my learning of a new language.
The strengths were structured exposure to the language. Also, we had snacks sometimes. The weaknesses were that the level of class engagement sometimes declined, making the class experience boring.
This course is very engaging and the professors are incredible.
Pacing was very good. I enjoyed this class and how it was taught.
Yes, I would absolutely recommend this course to another student - specifically because I really enjoyed my instructor.
Yes. Italian is a beautiful language and the department for Italian at Yale is excellent.
